sentences.sentence: It was a hoot to hear boos and cheers, and see all the waving light sabers.
sentences.translation: 能听见大声的吵闹和欢呼声，还能看见所有的挥动的光剑。

sentences.sentence: "These guys start waving their sabers, chasing these veterans out," Blacher says.
sentences.translation: 布莱彻说：“那些军人开始挥舞马刀，把老兵们赶开。”

sentences.sentence: The sabers in this movie will be made of graphite, the same material used to make fishing rods.
sentences.translation: 本片中的光剑将用石墨制成，和制作吊鱼杆的是同一种材料。
